Seen it at down2load"

I don't get it.  Is this a statement or indirect question directing us to have a look at your torrent list?  Or were looking through your uploads and saw it there and thought to yourself 'cool I just saw The Tourist here in my list of stuff'?  Weird because you would of probably put it there.  

If not then perhaps someone has hacked into your account to upload this movie for you.  But then why would they do this?  Maybe they like you and want to help out or they might be trying to frame you with copyright infringement.  Unlikely, so another theory is that you have multiple personalities and one of your more generous indenties uploaded it while the personality whom posted the comment doesn't remember what they did.  Even thou they are one in the same.  

"Seen it at down2load."  What does this mean?  Could it be answered by logic, or are we witness to the supernatural.  Weird or what?
